data.title: âKaraFun - Karaoke Singing
data.meta_description: Enjoy karaoke on your Mac and take the experience to another level! Thousands of karaoke songs to sing with your friends and all your favorite styles of music.â¦
data.text:
We're adding new songs everyday! Sing out the latest hits as soon as they're released.

Enjoy karaoke on your Mac and take the experience to another level! Thousands of karaoke songs to sing with your friends and all your favorite styles of music.

-- Free --

Test KaraFun on hundreds of free songs without creating an account!

-- Premium: a karaoke application that includes: --

â¢ Sing along to over 60,000 songs available instantly

â¢ Control lead and background vocals on any track

â¢ Download songs in offline mode

â¢ Enjoy new songs daily with an automatically updated catalog

â¢ Keep and access your favorite songs

â¢ Use with AirPlay!

-- Premium Access --

Access the whole catalog and unlock special features to sing with your friends with a week pass or monthly subscription.

â¢ Catalog :

Are you all about the latest songs or more so the karaoke classics? We love both! KaraFun features a large collection of karaoke songs, from decade hits to the latest chart toppers. Feel free to dig around in our library. We're sure that you'll find the perfect song for any occasion.

â¢ Favorites :

Add your favorite songs to your favorites: it's the perfect place to keep all your songs and find them easily.

â¢ Get backup: Lead / Background Vocal Adjustment :

We've got your back when you need it. Activate lead or background vocals and adjust the volume to however loud you want them to be. Sing along with the singer or backup singers voices or turn them back off. You call the shots!

Make it your own Key/Tempo adjustment : if the song key is too high or low, adjust it to match your voice. Same goes for the tempo... make the song just the way you want it.

-- Offline mode --

Hosting a karaoke party in the boondocks? KaraFun's got you covered even when there's no internet. Sync your favorite songs offline and keep the party going!

-- Works with AirPlay / External Screen --

Connect your device to any AirPlay compatible device, or directly to any video-projector or TV, and enjoy the most powerful karaoke machine ever.

Karaoke Party success guaranteed!

Terms of service: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

mlanom ,

Well, it was funâ¦until last update.

I hope one of the developers reads this. So many features were unfortunately taken away with the update. Not sure why because I donât think any of it was doing anyone harm.

I, like many others who use this app, am a musician and use it for practice purposes all the time and the most useful features were taken away. Examples:

â¢Double tapping to go backwards or forward 10 seconds has been removed. Now I have to touch and glide my finger and it never quite lines up, so I can never get it back exactly where I want it to be.

â¢Saving tempo and key changes has been removed. In all of my favorites and stored songs I had several key changes that could be saved so I donât have to fiddle with it each time I line up my songs in the queueâ¦UGH?! Why?!

â¢Wonât start from the beginning after pressing play. At any given point during a song you could hit the back button and start from the beginning. That has been removed. Now I have to use my finger to glide it back to the beginning and it never starts on the first tee. It always skipped the first couple seconds. Very annoying and strange and again, why did you remove that?!

Anyways, a bit heartbreaking that I updated but maybe theyâll change it back one day.

Developer Response ,

Hi there! All these features are still available, would you mind getting in touch at support@karafun.fr so we can help you use them? :) Thanks!
